===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|derogatory}} [[communist bandit]]

====Usage notes====
A [[derogatory]] term for Chinese communists that was once commonly used by the [[w:Kuomintang|Nationalist forces]] led by {{w|Chiang Kai-shek}}.

====Synonyms====
* {{zh-l|赤匪|chìfěi}} red bandit
* {{zh-l|毛匪|Máofěi}} Mao's bandit
* {{zh-l|毛赤|Máochì}}
* {{zh-l|黃俄/黄俄|huáng'é}} "yellow Russian"
